abstract: University of Washington football coach Chris Petersen announces that, in effort to minimize distractions, identity of starting quarterback will remain undisclosed until season opener at Boise State.
lead_paragraph: Chris Petersen is keeping his pick for his starting quarterback a secret until the team takes the field for Friday night’s season opener, at Boise State.

headline.main: Washington Coach Keeps Quiet on Starter

snippet: Chris Petersen is keeping his pick for his starting quarterback a secret until the team takes the field for Friday night’s season opener, at Boise State.
